attributes.action: Support Boris Johnson to leave EU and move economy forward by all means
attributes.additional_details: To show that the majority of the UK support our Prime Minister
attributes.background: Those signing believe that the actions of PM Boris Johnson is supported in leaving EU and developing the British economy by all means

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
